uan.legend: Which claim do you want to continue?

person-named.label: The person named on the duty to remove notice

has-legal-representative.label: An immigration advisor representing the claimant
has-legal-representative.hint: Such as a solicitor or legal representative. You must have already sent a letter of authority to the Home Office to confirm that you can represent the person named on the duty to remove letter.

someone-else.label: Someone helping the person named on the duty to remove notice
someone-else.hint: You cannot give immigration advice. You must answer all the questions as if you are the person named on the duty to remove letter.

how-removal-condition-1-applies.legend: Why does your Illegal Migration Act notice say removal condition 1 applies to you?

entered-without-permission.label: You needed permission to enter the UK and you entered without permission

by-deception.label: You entered the UK with permission which you got by deception
by-deception.hint: For example, if you or someone else lied on your application.

deportation-order-applies.label: You entered the UK when a deportation order applied to you

travel-ban.label: When you arrived in or entered the UK, a travel ban applied to you
travel-ban.hint: This includes a travel ban imposed by the United Nations Security Council, or UK under the Sanctions and Anti-Money Laundering Act 2018.

arrived-without-visa.label: You needed a valid entry clearance (visa), and you arrived without it

arrived-without-eta.label: You needed a valid electronic travel authorisation (ETA), and you arrived without it

entered-without-permission.legend: Did you need permission to enter the UK but entered without it?

entered-without-permission-detail.label: Explain why this is not correct

entered-with-travel-ban.legend: Did you arrive in or enter the UK, when a travel ban applied to you?

entered-with-travel-ban-detail.label: Explain why this is not correct

entered-by-deception.legend: Did you enter the UK with permission you got by deception?

entered-by-deception-detail.label: Explain why this is not correct

arrived-without-clearance.legend: Did you need a valid entry clearance (visa) but arrived without one?

arrived-without-clearance-detail.label: Explain why this is not correct

without-eta.legend: Did you need a valid electronic travel authorisation (ETA) but arrived without one?

without-eta-detail.label: Explain why this is not correct

deportation-order-applied.legend: Did you enter the UK when a deportation order applied to you?

deportation-order-applied-detail.label: Explain why this is not correct
